text: Waldpolenz Solar Park, is a photovoltaic (PV) power plant, to the east of Leipzig in Germany. The power plant is a 40-megawatt solar power system using new technology. It is in the Muldentalkreis district in the state of Saxony in eastern Germany. The investment cost for the Waldpolenz solar park amounts to some Euro 130 million. ==Related pages== * Photovoltaics * Pocking Solar Park in Germany * Renewable energy commercialization * Solar cell * Solar power station in Victoria * Wind power in Germany ==References== ==Other websites== * Worldâ€™s largest solar power plant being built in eastern Germany Category:Buildings and structures in Saxony Category:Power stations in Germany Category:Solar power plants
title: Waldpolenz Solar Park
